        grepFromFiles in interface GrepInterface

                                  java.lang.String... fileNames)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Extract the lines and count number of lines for grep from files and insert them into lineResults and countResults respectively.
        Parameters:
        pattern - supplied by user
        isCaseInsensitive - supplied by user
        lineResults - a StringJoiner of the grep line results
        countResults - a StringJoiner of the grep line count results
        fileNames - a String Array of file names supplied by user

        java.lang.Exception
